content: I think the Strawberry Basil Water and the Fresh Berry Tea would be perfect for the brunch. They're both light and refreshing, and the fruity flavors will complement the sweetness of the waffles and the savory flavors of the omelette nicely. I've been experimenting with different brunch recipes on weekends, and I think these drinks will add a nice touch to the meal. Do you have any suggestions for desserts to serve after the meal? Maybe something light and fruity to end the brunch on a sweet note?
